Context.description: Additional properties associated with this event type.

EntityRef.description: A reference to an entity or resource associated with the event.

Id.description: An unique ID for this event, assigned by Eventlog.

Name.description: The name (or type) of the event, assigned by the event source.

Source.description: The source of the event, assigned by the event source.

SourceTime.description: The source timestamp of the event - RFC3339 Nanosecond format.

title: JSON Schema for an Eventlog Event
